#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	int t,i,temp;
	cin>>t;
	getchar();
	while(t--) {
		string s;
		getline(cin,s);

		for(i=0;i<s.size();i++) {
			if(s[i]>='a' and s[i]<='z') {
				int k=s[i]-'a';
				cout<<k*k;				
			}
			if(s[i]==' ') {
				cout<<"$";
				continue;
			}
			if(s[i+1]>='a'and s[i+1]<='z')
				cout<<"-";
		}
		cout<<endl;
		}	 
		return 0;
}
